saying: Never take a nibble when you can take a bite.
description: Peanut is a peppy squirrel villager in the Animal Crossing series. As a peppy villager, Peanut will appear friendly and hospitable towards the player, making it easy to befriend her. Her name comes from peanuts, which squirrels are known to eat. Her Japanese name likely comes from momo, meaning peach or pink; in addition to her color, this might refer to the Japanese proverb
